title: 587. Reaction to Big Ten Playing in the Fall & the Impact on Opt Outs
itunes:title: 587. Reaction to Big Ten Playing in the Fall & the Impact on Opt Outs
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys react to the news of the Big Ten returning to play in the fall and the Pac-12 potentially doing the same, while also looking at what players who opted out of the season before this news could do and why they should be allowed to opt back in (2:24). Next, the pair analyze how Jaguars CB C.J. Henderson did in Week 1 and follow it by a discussion of grading players differently if they play in 2020 vs. not play (21:08). Then, the duo discuss how 12 personnel is on the rise in the NFL (27:42). To wrap up the show, the guys preview the Bengals vs. Browns Thursday Night Football game by saying what they're watching out for (31:40).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
